message.body: Echo_Mask is now live! Streaming I Wanna Be the Guy: Christmas 2 (Secret Santa Games 2025) - Day 1
OtiWolf subscribed at Tier 1. They've subscribed for 11 months, currently on a 9 month streak! one more come on
holy shit happy halloween easter new year birthday honnakahoweveryouspellit armor day pingas

that is an insult to pokemon..

reactbot has been defeated and befriended again
you killed his podcast career bro, fuck you actually?
its a maximum of 3, not a minimum
they made the screens look very nice
i mean.... you are free to interpret the rule however you like

or the maker made the game while sitting inside of 1 room

I don't wanna reveal which game I made tho
what i did was just add the entire thing as a windows defender
oh yeah its iwverve not verve

i mean thats what im used to at this point lol
It's very easy to fall into the trap of making something too hard, since you're the primary playtester of your game
ive literally never thought about that before lmao
not that im gonna stop using the nickname though, i dont care that much
you can also just do purr if you prefer
Especially if you're making something learny and not precision. Like "no this input isn't hard I can do it everytime!" but that muscle memory was built up over the course of you making your game
stage was still a banger though

it was my favorite stage in dldc

not only that you have to pick an order to play them
this is more significant than you think
each of the games has a piece of an encoded string hidden somewhere in it, and when you assemble the string and decipher it you obtain the link to balloons

I'd probably draw a goofy bee costume for the player and have them start by fishing. Of course, the fishing rod gets nuked and the bee has to go to the hunting store to buy a new fishing rod but because he's a bee the employees and whatnot are trying to kill him with various things one would try to kill a bee with. That's how my brain works. Carry on.
i already had to work late into the night / morning several times to have time to work on my game this year
you dont wanna bee the person
Exactly. That's what DLDC was for.
yeee i really just do not think about making a better / worse game than someone else
my game sucks but its my sucks so its okay

as long as you make the recipient happy it's goal accomplished
I try to make a game that my person would like. That's good in my books. It's not for everyone else.
@HimuraChiya Christmas is a magical time to put down the weapons and reconcile
despite having to cut a bunch of stuff I feel like the game I've made turned out pretty well
